hero.headline: How to Create YouTube Playlists
hero.subheadline: Organize content strategically. Boost watch time with smart playlists.

sections.content: Playlists do more than organize—they increase watch time through autoplay, improve SEO through additional ranking opportunities, and help viewers navigate your content. Strategic playlist creation can significantly impact channel growth. Here's how to use them effectively.

faq.question: Do playlists help with YouTube algorithm?
faq.answer: Yes—playlists increase session watch time through autoplay. More watch time signals quality content. Playlists also rank in search independently.

faq.question: How many playlists should I have?
faq.answer: Create one for each distinct topic or series. Quality over quantity. Empty or sparse playlists look unprofessional. 5-15 well-organized playlists typical.

faq.question: Should I include other creators' videos?
faq.answer: Can help viewers and build relationships, but prioritize your content for watch time. Mixed playlists can be useful for curated topic collections.

faq.question: Best video order for playlists?
faq.answer: For series: chronological. For topics: best video first to hook viewers, then by relevance or recency. Test different orders.
